name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
description: End Phase: When Tartaglia is on the field and has this card equipped, if the opponent's active character has Riptide attached, deal 1 Piercing DMG to that character.
descriptionraw: End Phase: When $[A1204] is on the field and has this card equipped, if the opponent's active character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112043]</color> attached, deal 1 $[K5] to that character.
